definitions.example: Earth was shapen by God for God's folk.

definitions.definition: To give something a shape and definition.
definitions.example: Shape the dough into a pretzel.   For my art project, I plan to shape my clay lump into a bowl.

definitions.definition: To form or manipulate something into a certain shape.
(of a country, person, etc) To give influence to.
To suit; to be adjusted or conformable.
The action of the verb to shape.
A method of positive reinforcement of behaviour patterns in operant conditioning.
